input_text:
Job Title: Technical Sales Engineer

Location: Alpharetta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Customer Service, Sales

Description:
Looking for a Technical Sales Engineer for design-build application in the commercial construction industry 
About the Job
You will start your training with inside sales, supporting the estimating and engineering departments for the first three to six months to learn the business. Eventually, you will support and train with the VP of Sales, making sales calls, lunch-and-learn presentations, and interacting with prospective customers. Traveling approximately one week/month to start will be required to gain experience. 


About the Company
Your new employer, in business for 40 years, engineers, manufactures, and constructs a proprietary system that is very competitive and offers many advantages for the project Owner. The company enjoys an excellent reputation with owners, architects, and construction companies, which is why they get a lot of repeat business.
 Your Compensation & Benefits:
Competitive Salary.Participate in the Incentive Bonus Program.Retirement plan of 401k with match.Employer participation in shared costs Health Insurance plans, including Dental, Vision, Flexible, & Health Savings Accounts. Employer-paid Life, STD & LTD Insurance,PTO at 23 days per year to start, including eight Federal holidays,Tuition & continued education reimbursement, professional career development & training programs & annual performance review to enhance your career path promotion. 

Requirements: 
Bachelors in Construction Science, Civil, or Structural Engineering prefered.Minimum of (3) years of construction product sales experience.Outgoing, charismatic personality with an ability to successfully engage customers to promote and sell the system.Willingness to travel +/- 3 days/week every 2 to 3 weeks, as required.Having experience with MS365, Procore, & Plan Swift software is preferred. 
Relocation Expense Reimbursement: Not at this time
What do you need to do now and the hiring process?
If interested in this role, click "Easy Apply" to forward your up-to-date resume and projects list to bobmac@oncoreccg.com.  If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, feel free to contact me for a confidential discussion about your career and where you would like to go, as well as a benchmarking of your compensation package.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
